questions.question: Resentment Scan: Rate 0–5. Who or what sparked it?
questions.prompt: Take a moment to scan for any resentment you're feeling. Rate it from 0-5 and identify who or what triggered it.
questions.follow_up: What's one step you could take toward letting this go?

questions.question: Notice any irritation or anger? Who or what is it directed at?
questions.prompt: Check for any irritation or resentment you might be holding onto right now.
questions.follow_up: How might holding onto this affect your sobriety?

questions.question: Is there anyone you're blaming right now?
questions.prompt: Take a quick inventory - are you blaming anyone for how you feel?
questions.follow_up: How could you take responsibility for your feelings?

questions.question: Selfishness Check: Where did I put me first today?
questions.prompt: Reflect honestly: did you prioritize your needs over others' in a way that wasn't healthy?
questions.follow_up: How might you balance your needs with others' needs?

questions.question: Have I been thinking about myself most of the day?
questions.prompt: Take a moment to notice if your thoughts have been mostly self-centered.
questions.follow_up: What's one way you could shift focus to helping someone else?

questions.question: Did I consider others' needs or only my own today?
questions.prompt: Reflect on your interactions. Did you consider others' needs or focus only on your own?
questions.follow_up: How might considering others' perspectives improve your recovery?

questions.question: Dishonesty Pulse: Did I bend the truth today? Three-word admit.
questions.prompt: Check if you've been completely honest in all your interactions today.
questions.follow_up: What might be driving this dishonesty? Fear? Pride? Convenience?

questions.question: Have I exaggerated or minimized anything today?
questions.prompt: Did you stretch the truth, leave out important details, or downplay something significant?
questions.follow_up: What would it take to set the record straight?

questions.question: Did I present myself authentically in all interactions today?
questions.prompt: Were you true to yourself in all your interactions, or did you wear a mask?
questions.follow_up: How does dishonesty affect your relationship with yourself?

questions.question: Fear Gauge: What's frightening me right now?
questions.prompt: Take a moment to identify any fear you're experiencing. What are you afraid might happen?
questions.follow_up: Is this fear based on facts or assumptions?

questions.question: What am I worrying about that I can't control?
questions.prompt: Identify something you're worried about that's outside your control.
questions.follow_up: How might you surrender this fear?

questions.question: Is fear driving any of my decisions right now?
questions.prompt: Check if fear is influencing your choices or behavior in this moment.
questions.follow_up: What would you do differently if you were acting from courage?

questions.question: Anger Alert: Rate rage 0–5 and name the trigger.
questions.prompt: Notice if you're feeling angry. Rate it from 0-5 and identify what triggered it.
questions.follow_up: What need of yours isn't being met?

questions.question: Am I feeling irritable, restless, or discontent right now?
questions.prompt: Check in with your emotions. Are you feeling annoyed or unsettled?
questions.follow_up: What healthy action could you take to address this feeling?

questions.question: Is there tension in my body? Where is it located?
questions.prompt: Scan your body for tension, which often signals anger or stress.
questions.follow_up: How can you release this physical tension?

questions.question: Guilt Gauge: What am I regretting or feeling ashamed about?
questions.prompt: Notice if you're experiencing guilt or shame about something.
questions.follow_up: What amends or actions could help address this?

questions.question: Is there something I'm avoiding thinking about?
questions.prompt: Check if you're pushing away thoughts about something you did or didn't do.
questions.follow_up: How might facing this directly support your recovery?

questions.question: Am I beating myself up over something I can't change?
questions.prompt: Notice if you're being harsh with yourself about past actions.
questions.follow_up: How can you practice self-forgiveness?

questions.question: Amends Prompt: Did I harm anyone today? Who needs an apology?
questions.prompt: Reflect on your interactions today. Did you hurt or offend anyone?
questions.follow_up: When and how will you make amends?

questions.question: Have I been short-tempered with anyone today?
questions.prompt: Check if you've been impatient or irritable with someone.
questions.follow_up: What's a simple way to make it right?

questions.question: Did I dismiss or invalidate anyone's feelings or perspective?
questions.prompt: Reflect on whether you truly listened to others or dismissed their views.
questions.follow_up: How could you demonstrate more respect next time?

questions.question: Service Reminder: Who can I help right now?
questions.prompt: Think of someone who might need support or assistance.
questions.follow_up: What specific action could you take to help them?

questions.question: How have I contributed to others' wellbeing today?
questions.prompt: Reflect on how you've helped others today, even in small ways.
questions.follow_up: What's one additional way you could be of service?

questions.question: Am I focused more on giving or receiving right now?
questions.prompt: Check your mindset. Are you thinking more about what you can give or get?
questions.follow_up: How might shifting to a giving mindset impact your recovery?

questions.question: Name three things you're grateful for in this moment.
questions.prompt: Take a moment to identify three specific things you appreciate right now.
questions.follow_up: How does focusing on gratitude affect your state of mind?

questions.question: What's one thing about recovery you're thankful for today?
questions.prompt: Identify something specific about your recovery journey that you appreciate.
questions.follow_up: How has this aspect of recovery changed your life?

questions.question: Who has supported your recovery that you're grateful for?
questions.prompt: Think of someone who has helped your recovery journey.
questions.follow_up: How might you express appreciation to them?

questions.question: HALT check: Are you Hungry, Angry, Lonely, or Tired right now?
questions.prompt: Quick check: which of these basic needs might need attention?
questions.follow_up: What simple action could you take to address this need?

questions.question: How's your energy level right now? (Low, Medium, High)
questions.prompt: Notice your physical energy. Are you depleted, energized, or somewhere in between?
questions.follow_up: How might your energy level be affecting your emotions and thinking?

questions.question: When did you last drink water? Are you hydrated?
questions.prompt: Check if you've been staying hydrated, which affects mood and cravings.
questions.follow_up: How can you remember to take better care of your physical needs?

questions.question: Have I connected with my Higher Power today?
questions.prompt: Reflect on whether you've taken time for spiritual connection today.
questions.follow_up: What simple practice could help you reconnect right now?

questions.question: Am I trying to control outcomes, or am I practicing acceptance?
questions.prompt: Notice if you're trying to force things to go your way versus accepting reality.
questions.follow_up: What situation might you need to surrender right now?

questions.question: What principle (honesty, hope, faith, courage, integrity, etc.) do I need to focus on right now?
questions.prompt: Consider which spiritual principle would be most helpful in your current situation.
questions.follow_up: How could you put this principle into practice today?

questions.question: Have I encountered any triggers today? How did I respond?
questions.prompt: Reflect on any situations that triggered cravings or negative patterns.
questions.follow_up: What worked or didn't work in your response?

questions.question: What situations or emotions tend to make me vulnerable to drinking?
questions.prompt: Identify a pattern of when you're most at risk for relapse.
questions.follow_up: What's your plan for handling this trigger next time?

questions.question: Am I putting myself in risky situations unnecessarily?
questions.prompt: Check if you're exposing yourself to triggers that could be avoided.
questions.follow_up: What boundaries might you need to set to protect your sobriety?

questions.question: When was my last meeting? Do I need to connect with the fellowship?
questions.prompt: Consider how connected you feel to your recovery community right now.
questions.follow_up: What's your plan for your next meeting or fellowship connection?

questions.question: Have I called my sponsor recently? Do I need to reach out?
questions.prompt: Check in on your relationship with your sponsor and if you need support.
questions.follow_up: What would be helpful to discuss with your sponsor?

questions.question: Which step am I working on, and what's my next action item?
questions.prompt: Reflect on your step work and what specific action you need to take next.
questions.follow_up: When will you complete this action?
